body_html: I'm not sure why you are not just using new. Is the goal to be able to allocate memory on the device? If so, it is surprising that using a Tensor wouldn't suit your needs. Perhaps you could explain more context.
body_text: I'm not sure why you are not just using new. Is the goal to be able to allocate memory on the device? If so, it is surprising that using a Tensor wouldn't suit your needs. Perhaps you could explain more context.
body: I'm not sure why you are not just using `new`. Is the goal to be able to allocate memory on the device? If so, it is surprising that using a Tensor wouldn't suit your needs. Perhaps you could explain more context.
